name: 0815 hat
notes:
the 0815 hat is a popular and classical design that has been around forever. the hat is worked in the round from the bottom up in a 1x1 ribbing design. through its foldable brim, the hat grows with the wearer and thanks to the ribbing, it is expandable and very flexible.

head circumference: 35-38 (39-45) 46-53 (54-56) 56-59 (59-62) cm

length: 19 (22) 26 (29) 32 (34) cm (washed and blocked)

yarn: 50 (50) 100 (100) 100 (150) g

suggested yarn: schachenmayr alpaca classico (50g/90m) or sandnesgarn baby lama (50g/67m) if you opt for sandnesgarn, you’ll need an extra ball of yarn for size adult l.

needles: 4,5mm circular needles (40 cm string) and 4,5mm dpns or use magic loop technique. you can also use 5mm needles to achieve a looser/slouchier design.

materials: 4 markers, tapestry needle.

gauge: 23 sts x 26 rows = 10cm in 1x1 ribbing

i’d be very happy to see your version of 0815 hat on instagram. please follow me @stadtkindknits and use the hashtag #0815hat

please, don’t hesitate to contact me via stadtkindknits@gmail.com for any questions. thank you and enjoy knitting!

marjorie
